content: **details** * pattern consists of 25 rounds * level is advanced * stitches/terms slip_stitch skip chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet tc dtr csdc bl blo fp bp cluster and popcorn -------------------------------- **languages** this pattern is available in both english & russian the russian version is linked as a pdf under the languages section after you follow the link to the pattern if you are able and desire to translate this pattern into your native language please use this form to contact me 1 only authorized translations are permitted * *russian language translation provided by ula tomaszewska and tested by tatyana norri * * *spanish/espanol language translation and testing provided by virginia padilla and tere gomis * ---------------------------------- **community** * join our discussion and support group on facebook 2 * join our discord channel 3 *thank you so very much to my lovely testers on this pattern cille heckenbach * 1 http //www gracefearon com/pattern-translator-application 2 https //www facebook com/groups/878254922303627/ 3 https //discord gg/atndgvj
